title: Bug 12906 - Unable to open file in another editor if already opened in one editor
description: When a file is already opened in one editor, attempting to open it in another editor does not display an error message as expected.
OB: When a file is already opened in one editor, no error message is displayed when attempting to open it in another editor.
EB: However, there should be a warning or error message displayed when attempting to open a file in another editor if it is already opened in one editor.
SR:
1. Open a file in one editor.
2. Attempt to open the same file in another editor.
3. Verify that a warning or error message is displayed indicating that the file is already opened in one editor.
